thread.section_title: Wyndham Garden Long Island City Manhattan View - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (New York) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: First trip to NYC
thread.title_full: First trip to NYC - Review of Wyndham Garden Long Island City Manhattan View, Long Island City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Jim F
title: First trip to NYC
text: This was our first trip to NYC and we were looking online for a reasonable priced place to stay. We were able to book this room for $73/night. We upgraded to a 'city view' also on line. The view was a little disappointing as it was more a view of the Queens Borough Bridge instead of the 'city view' I had anticipated. The hotel offers a free shuttle to Times Square and the nearest Metro station. We did not take advantage of this offer as we needed to be downtown early each morning.
